Interface PTPassengerAgent

    All Known Implementing Classes:

extends PassengerAgent
    Author:
    mrieser

    • Method Detail

      • getEnterTransitRoute

        boolean getEnterTransitRoute(TransitLine line,
                             TransitRoute transitRoute,
                             List<TransitRouteStop> stopsToCome,
                             TransitVehicle transitVehicle)
        Informs a passenger waiting at a stop that a transit line has arrived and is ready to be boarded.
        Parameters:
        line - the transit line that is available
        stopsToCome - the remaining stops on the route to be served by this vehicle before the trip ends
        transitVehicle - TODO
        route - the route being served
        Returns:
        true if the passenger wants to board the line, false otherwise

      • getExitAtStop

        boolean getExitAtStop(TransitStopFacility stop)
        Informs a passenger in a transit vehicle that the vehicle has arrived at the specified stop.
        Parameters:
        stop - the stop the vehicle arrived
        Returns:
        true if the passenger wants to exit the vehicle, false otherwise

      • getDesiredAccessStopId

        Id<TransitStopFacility> getDesiredAccessStopId()
        Asks a passenger which is departing on a transit leg about the stop it wants to use for accessing the transit line.
        Returns:
        The transit stop id.

      • getDesiredDestinationStopId

        Id<TransitStopFacility> getDesiredDestinationStopId()

      • getWeight

        double getWeight()
        Returns:
        a statistical weight, how many "real" agents this agent represents, e.g. "5.0" if you simulate a 20%-sample.
